## NFTDrop.getAll() method

Get the metadata for all NFTs on this drop

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAll(): Promise<NFTMetadata[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[NFTMetadata](./solana.nftmetadata.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

metadata for all minted NFTs

## Example


```jsx
const nfts = await program.getAll();
```
